00018 #ifndef __Base_Input__
00019 #define __Base_Input__
00020 
00021 #include "math_util.h"
00022 
00023 nec_float diff(nec_float a, nec_float b)
00024 {
00025         if (a == b)
00026                 return 0;
00027         if ((a < 1e-8) && (b < 1e-8))
00028                 return 0;
00029 
00030         nec_float sub = a - b;
00031         nec_float sum = a + b;
00032         
00033         nec_float ret = sub*sub;
00034         if ((a != 0) && (b != 0))
00035                 ret /= sum*sum;
00036         ret = sqrt(ret);
00037         if (ret > 1e-2)
00038         {
00039                 stringstream ss;
00040                 ss << "diff(" << a << "," << b << ") = " << ret;
00041                 string s = ss.str();
00042                 throw s;
00043         }
00044         return ret;
00045 }
00046 
00047 nec_float diff(nec_complex a, nec_complex b)
00048 {
00049         if (a == b)
00050                 return 0;
00051         if ((abs(a) < 1e-8) && (abs(b) < 1e-8))
00052                 return 0;
00053 
00054         nec_float ret = norm(a - b);
00055         nec_float sum = norm(a + b);
00056         
00057         if (sum != 0)
00058                 ret /= sum;
00059                 
00060         ret = sqrt(ret);
00061         if (ret > 1e-2)
00062         {
00063                 stringstream ss;
00064                 ss << "diff(" << a << "," << b << ") = " << ret;
00065                 string s = ss.str();
00066                 throw s;
00067         }
00068         return ret;
00069 }
00070 
00071 class BaseInput
00072 {
00073 private:
00074         char linec[512];
00075 
00076 
00077 protected:
00078         string readline(istream& is)
00079         {
00080                 is.getline(&linec[0],512);
00081                 return string(&linec[0]);
00082         }
00083 
00084         double read_sci(istream& in_stream)
00085         {
00086                 double x;
00087                 in_stream.setf(ios_base::skipws);
00088                 in_stream >> x;
00089                 return x;
00090         }
00091 
00092         double read_fixed(istream& in_stream)
00093         {
00094                 double x;
00095                 in_stream.setf(ios_base::skipws);
00096                 in_stream >> x;
00097                 return x;
00098         }
00099 };
